home.title: OpenDataFitHou
home.searchPlaceholder: Search locations in Vietnam... (e.g. Hoan Kiem Lake, Temple of Literature, BIDV)
home.description: OpenDataFitHou is an open-source project that collects and links open data from Wikidata, OpenStreetMap, and many other sources. We standardize data into Linked Open Data (RDF) format and visualize it on maps, making queries, analysis, and application development easier.
home.descriptionExtra: The project contributes to digital transformation and opens up opportunities to exploit open data for research, education, and the community. ğŸŒâœ¨

intro.title: ğŸ“‹ Project Introduction
intro.objective: Collect, standardize, and provide open data in Linked Open Data format
intro.context: Part of OLP PMNM 2025, serving research & digital transformation
intro.vision: Data transparency, community support, easy reuse

features.title: â­ Key Features
features.display: Display and highlight places on map
features.nearby: Find nearby services like ATMs, Bus stops
features.download: Download place data in XML or RDF format
